summary: Recognize python source file encoding directive(PEP 0263)
name: python_encoding.vim
description: A newly added feature of python 2.3 is PEP 0263(http://www.python.org/peps/pep-0263.html). Now you can add a magic comment that defines the encoding of the source file. This script recognizes this directive and changes Vim's encoding accordingly.
install_details: Just put it in your ftplugin directory.
